Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: The Australian Federal Budget is about to be unveiled and the people are in for some interesting news. Treasurer Jim Chalmers promises hundreds of dollars to help people struggling with cost-of-living troubles. With over 5 million households to receive up to $500 in energy bill relief the single parent payment scheme will also be extended. The people of Australia are eager to hear more about measures that will address their everyday financial challenges.
